# StraightToYourAI

> Turn any YouTube video or web page into an AI-ready markdown document.

StraightToYourAI is a Chrome extension that extracts content from YouTube videos (transcripts) and web pages, then packages them for easy consumption by AI assistants like Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, and others.

## Documentation

- [Welcome / Getting Started](https://toyourai.plstry.me/welcome): How to install and use the extension
- [Privacy Policy](https://toyourai.plstry.me/privacy): Our privacy practices

## Features

- Extract YouTube video transcripts automatically
- Extract web page content via Jina Reader
- Create collections of up to 10 items
- Share collections via .md or .txt URLs
- Open directly in Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, Grok, or Copilot

## API Endpoints

Collections can be accessed as markdown at:
- `https://toyourai.plstry.me/s/{id}.md` - Markdown format
- `https://toyourai.plstry.me/s/{id}.txt` - Plain text format

These URLs are designed to be fetched by AI assistants for analysis.

## Contact

- Email: toyourai@plstry.me
